data.title: First Breakfast Quesadilla Ever
data.text: Great find after my trip to Martin Memorial.  The server was very friendly and attentive.  The coffee was good.  The place is super clean.  The ambiance is perfect.  Easy access & ample parking.

data.title: Consistently delicious
data.text: Reminiscent of the Greek diners I frequented in New York with its sure to please variety of food, The Vista Grille offers up gourmet food at affordable prices.  My husband, son and I have been eating at Vista Grille since its opening, and are never disappointed.  The wait staff is friendly, service is timely, the restaurant itself is immaculate and the food is always prepared to perfection. In addition to the terrific menu selections, daily specials are always a treat!

data.title: Good food and service
data.text: A group of us met at Vista Grill for dinner. Waitress was very friendly and attentive, let us know what the specials were with descriptions. Food was delicious. There were 10 of us, we were in and finished in about an hour.

data.title: VISTA Grille Port St Lucie
data.text:
Good food, reasonable prices and excellent service.  This is not a fancy place, but very good.
We usually enjoy a cockytail, but Vista is beer and wine only.

data.title: Wonderful food, friendly atmosphere
data.text: Had lunch there with a few friends recently...the Turkey/Cranberry Flatbread was amazing! Very tasty! My friends also enjoyed their dishes as well. Even the home made potato salad was yummy. Great place for a casual lunch or dinner...service was very good.

data.title: Dinner for 12 Served With Cheer and on Time
data.text: Dinner with a number of my fellow club members at this full service restaurant and the dining was fine.  There were a number of varied tastes and appetites and all were satisfied.  I was quite pleased to see that all of the entrees came out hot and were served almost simultaneously by our cheerful waitress.  Our group will definitely return to this local dining venue in the next few weeks.

data.title: Breakfast for seven
data.text: Well why the low rating walked in early place was empty. Asked for coffee got it asked for cream , asked again ,asked again  finally went to kitchen to ask still had to wait. Tnhe waitress was not friendly nor pleasant as a waitress should be. And the food bland at best. I think the toast was made with stale bread because when you picked it up to folded it it crumbled. Enough said go if you want and i hope your visit was better than mine.

data.title: Great food
data.text: Wonderful staff answered all our questions about the menu. We came in around 6p. The breakfast and lunch menu is varied and expansive- the dinner menu is pretty sparse. We were delighted to know that you can order off of every menu at dinner. Food was excellent!

data.title: Great local find!
data.text: We just happened upon this locally owned diner. So glad we did. My son ordered French toast and it was so delicious he ordered another plate full! I had the grilled mahi sandwich with caramelized onions. It was also wonderful! The Cole slaw was the best I've had since my mama's! Great food and service. Super nice, clean place. Thank you!

data.title: The good, the bad and the ugly.
data.text: Stopped in to try the biscuits and gravy.  The waitress was friendly but sitting at the bar you could hear the kitchen chatter and the owner yelling at the waitresses, not a customer friendly scenario.  Coffee was great and the presentation was great.  The minute I looked at the gravy I knew it was a water or reduced fat milk based gravy, it wasn't tasty and I just could not force it down.  The biscuits were flat and not fluffy.  The home fries were cooked beautifully, some all most potato chip crisp, just the way I like them, except they were laced with bell pepper, something I can not eat. So all in all not much I could eat on this plate.  Two bites was all I could do and moving the bell peppers away from the potatoes didn't help, they were cooked together. If you like bell peppers and Hoover gravy (poor man's gravy), you'll love their breakfast, I did not. I pushed the plate away, and the floor manager (I assumed) came over and wouldn't charge me, however I drank two cups of coffee so I insisted on paying for that and left a tip,wasn't the waitresses fault.  So this is a restaurant that wants to take care of their customers and knows how to present food.

data.title: Breakfast
data.text: I like there omelettes they use real eggs everything taste good. Restaurant is clean, waitress was friendly and prompt service.

data.title: So poor
data.text: Service was mediocre, sat their for a bit and was barely attended too either she was cleaning or doing something else. There was only me n my husband and another couple there, so she had 0 reasons to be unattentive. The food was terrible. My husband ordered the Mediterranean chicken it was cold when it was immediately served I had fried chicken and the batter was soggy. (Gross) am not the type to complain about food much when I go to restaurants because am not sure what happens in the kitchen of places like this where there is literally no people. I would never revisit here, ever again. 😑😑😑😑😑

data.title: Dinner with my son
data.text: 1st time visit and we will be back. Fresh food and great service. It's a hidden jem! Highly recommend...the lolly pop lamb chops and mashed potatoes. If you are from the North East you will love this food.

data.title: Did not disappoint
data.text: Having arrived in PSL four days ago, we had some difficulty finding a decent restaurant with good food. We stumbled upon Vista Grill, which exceeded our expectations.  The food was freshly prepared and delicious, and the staff was professional and friendly. The highlight was the warm rice pudding we had for dessert, absolutely scrumptious. We will definitely be back.

data.title: Very good food and servic
data.text: I've been here a couple of times, it is located in an odd place, it does lack it's own internal look but the food and service are very good. Their menu should be reduced, too many choices make you think they can't keep fresh food around. I wish them luck!

data.title: Excellent All 'Round!
data.text: My husband and I recently discovered Vista Grille.  We love it for a number of reasons.  First, it's family-owned, not part of a big national chain.  Second, we've never been disappointed with either the food or the very reasonable prices.  We're not particularly lovers of Greek food, but there are many popular Greek dishes on the menu for those who are, as well as more American fare.  Third, it's not a loud, noisy place where you have to raise your voice to be heard across the table.  Finally, our FAVORITE FOOD is the patty melt cooked to taste on grilled rye with caramelized onions and Swiss cheese.  YUMMY!

data.title: Good food and service
data.text: They serve of up some good food along with pleasant service. The prices are a little high but I'm learning that the cost in this area is higher overall. They have to pay more for taxes, etc. I would rather pay a little more for higher quality food and the food was worthy. I got the gyro, probably the best I have had so far in the area. The burger was cooked exactly right and very tasty. I think I'd try their Ruben next.

data.title: Found a new spot
data.text: Beautiful decor and friendly and attentive staff. Next time I'll order lunch or dinner. My boyfriend had the Greek quesedilla. I had the 2/2/2 breakfast special. His food looked and smelled so good I didn't want mine. The pancakes were not the best. Definitely will be returning!

data.title: Great Food - Nice Welcome
data.text:
Been here quite a few times usually for late breakfast - Husband likes the Greek omelette and I love the eggs and home fries with English muffin and jam. Staff are always friendly and service is quick and efficient.
Will be visiting lots and recommending to friends and family.

data.title: Family lunch
data.text: I took the family put for lunch, and the did at vista grille was amazing. The chef kept telling in the phone, but it really didn't take away from the great taste of the food. I had a gyro, and it was one of the best I've ever had. The kids options were very ample, and we all left satisfied.
